column2: love the selection of whisky and beer
column3: and the food is pretty darn tasty. I had the pleasure of trying a couple dishes before I decided to make a lifestyle change and go vegan. I still think meat is delicious
column4: I choose this for many other reasons. I encourage you to do it to
column6: try the meatloaf.It's an appetizer and I forgot the name but it's awesome Still coming here for the drinks and staff! Oh
column7: salmon was good too. I was on the hunt for the best mac and cheese as well which is overbut theirs was good enough to order again. Please take into account that I was a mac and cheese snob and love eating at 3 Michelin star restaurants so please take into the count of people and their reviews! I'm picky picky picky!
